All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddSwitchController
This class provides an API call to add new switches from the frontend
AuthAlgorithm
 
CommsException
This exception is never thrown.
CorsConfiguration
This class is used to configure springbootÂ´s Cross Origin Resource Sharing
EncryptionAlgorithm
 
GCLEntry
This class represents a single entry in a gate control list on a TSN switch It contains a random identifier, a list of gate states and the time how long the entry will be active per cycle.
GetSwitchesController
This class provides an API call to fetch all switch information from the backend to the frontend
GlobalExceptionHandler
This class creates a global exception handler to log uncaught exceptions for debugging purposes
INetworkStateCache
This interface defines operations on the NetworkStateCache The netstatecache is used to store and perform operations on the information aquired about the network state with its participants and configurations.
ISwitchCommsCommunicator
This interface defines low-level SNMP operations on a switch that get or set a single value on the switch It gets/sets TSN-parameters defined in IEEE 802.1Qbv and LLDP information about the switch and its neighbors Thread-safe operation has to be ensured by the SwitchCommsManager, so thread-safety is not a concern here
ISwitchCommsManager
This interfaces defines high-level operations on switches via SNMP It uses low-level functions provided by an object implementing the ISwitchCommsCommunicator interface to set and get values from a switch via SNMPv3 Any class implementing this interface shall ensure thread-safe execution of all switch operations
ISwitchCredStore
This interface defines operations on the persistent storage of switch credentials Any class implementing this feature has to ensure thread-safe operation on the chosen persistent storage method
LLDPDataTuple
This class represents the sysname, mac adress and local port number of an LLDP remote table entry
NetworkStateCache
This class implements the INetworkStateCache interface with in-memory storage It ensures thread-safe operation with the use of a monitor
PDUErrorException
This exception is thrown if a PDU response contains information about an error
PDUException
This exception is never thrown.
PDUNullException
This exception is thrown if there is no response PDU after an SNMP request
Port
This class represents a TSN capable port on a TSN switch.
PTPTimeTuple
This class represents the seconds and nanoseconds of a PTPTimeValue
ReloadBackendController
This class provides an API call to reload the backend from the frontend
RemoveSwitchController
This class provides an API call to remove a switch permanently from the backend
ResponseNullException
This exception is thrown if there is no SNMP response after a request
SavePortController
This class provides an API call to save a new TSN configuration for a port and apply it on the switch
SNMPSwitchCommsCommunicator
This class provides low-level SNMP operations on a switch that get or set a single value on the switch It gets/sets TSN-parameters defined in IEEE 802.1Qbv and LLDP information about the switch and its neighbors The class uses the SNMP4J library for the SNMP communication with the switch
StartupManager
This class provides the startup procedure for the WebCNC It sets launch parameters to their default or specified values It fetches all switch credentials from the switchCredStore, retrieves their TSN / LLDP information via the switchComms and stores it in the netStateCache
Switch
This class represents a TSN capable switch with a unique identifier, its SNMP credentials, its TSN ports, and network system name information about itself and neighbors that were gathered via LLDP by the switch
SwitchCommsManager
This class provides high-level operations on switches via SNMP It uses low-level functions provided by a SwitchCommsCommunicator to set and get values from a switch via SNMPv3 It orchestrates the low-level calls to achieve the desired high-level operation and ensures thread safety via a monitor
SwitchCredStore
This class implements the ISwitchCredStore interface with a simple text file as persistent storage It ensures thread-safe operation with the use of a monitor
SwitchInfo
This class represents the information required to gather TSN and LLDP data from the switch via SNMPv3
ValidatePasswordController
This class provides an API call to validate the password of the WebCNC
WebcncApplication
The main class of the WebCNC It stores application-wide parameters and objects
